catalog_info.title: The Later Philosophy of Wittgenstein
catalog_info.notes: Friday class meetings will be held at the discretion of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: A close reading of Ludwig Wittgenstein's Philosophical Investigations, focusing on its treatments of the topics of meaning, reference, rule-following, cognition, perception, "the private mental realm" knowledge, skepticism, and the nature of philosophy. Attention to Wittgenstein's philosophical methodology, with its claim to dissolve philosophical problems rather than propose solutions to them.
